1.title: Hello World
1.description: Write a Python file `hello.py` printing the string 'Hello, World!'
1.test: Entering the command `python hello.py` should print the string 'Hello, World!'

2.title: Git Clone
2.description: Clone a repo from github, using the URL https://github.com/liusida/gym-codecraft.git
2.test: Check the gym-codecraft repo is in the working directory

3.title: Sort
3.description: Download the file at https://raw.githubusercontent.com/liusida/gym-codecraft/main/assets/3/input.txt, read the file to memory, create a list for the numbers, and sort them in ascend order. Finally, save them into `output.txt` in the working directory.
